content.question: For which of the following probability assignments are events <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="B" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> independent?

choices.label: <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.12" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.12</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></math>.

<math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.0" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.0</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.2</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

<math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.5" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.5</mn></mrow></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection, B complement, equals 0.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><msup><mrow><mi>B</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, <math alttext="the probability of, A intersection B, equals 0.1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>A</mi><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, and <math alttext="the probability of, A complement intersection B, equals 0.4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>c</mi></mrow></msup><mo>∩</mo><mi>B</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0.4</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>.

unit.text: 4: Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions

topic.text: 4.6: Independent Events and Unions of Events

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine relative frequencies, proportions, or probabilities using simulation or calculations.
